Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 49th overall pick, by Montreal in 2019...
Traded from Montreal to St. Louis (C) on 3/2/2019 (Going to MON: 1B Donald Lamberth, LF Brett Godby. Going to STL: 3B Tyler Hazel, C John Searles)...
Injured on 7/6/2019 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Seattle on 7/30/2019 (Going to STL: C James Gilligan. Going to SEA: C John Searles)...

Injured on 5/5/2021 with a Broken Finger, out for 4 weeks...
